code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useQuery}from'@apollo/client';import{QUERY_USER}from'../utils/queries';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function OrderHistory(){const{data}=useQuery(QUERY_USER);let user;if(data){user=data.user;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container my-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"\u2190 Back to Products"}),user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Order History for ",user.username]}),user.orders.map(order=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"my-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:new Date(parseInt(order.purchaseDate)).toLocaleDateString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex-row",children:order.products.map((_ref,index)=>{let{_id,image,name,price}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card px-1 py-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:`/products/${_id}`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{alt:name,src:`/images/${image}`}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:name})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["$",price]})})]},index);})})]},order._id))]}):null]})});}export default OrderHistory;
